name: Tiding Magnet. A Photograph of Your Name or Initials in Sand, Encased in a Glass Magnet.
description: This single flat glass marble magnet features a photograph of your name written in sand. Bulk Ordering The first magnet you purchase is $11. Each additional identical magnet is $2 (using the same photograph). To order more than one, please email us with your desired amount of magnets and we'll set up a custom listing for you. (We charge a minimum of $9 for the sandwriting session and $9 for the magnet). How They're Made We write your name in the sand on one of Cape May's many famous beaches and Capture it with our Canon Rebel XTi. We print our photographs on Crystal Archive paper and seal them against flat marble magnets, gluing a powerful ceramic magnet to the back. We spent weeks through trial and error testing different products until we found the best to make the best-quality magnets possible. Customize It Please include the name you would like in "messages to seller" at check out, or send us a message with the name. How Big? The glass magnets are approx. 1.5 inches in diameter(3.8 cm). Shipping/Timing Due to weather and custom workmanship, please allow us 2 weeks to send your item. We always package and present our items professionally so that you can be confident enough to have us ship a gift directly to a friend. If this is your intent with your purchase, let us know in "messages to seller" at check-out and we'll attach a free gift card with your order.

name: Tiding Flat Note Cards. 100 Flat Note Cards With Envelopes Featuring a Photograph of Your Custom Mes
description: 100 flat note cards feature your photographed customized message-in-sand. It's perfect for weddings, anniversaries, birth announcements, congratulations or just to say something nice to the person you love. It's also the perfect gift for the person that already has everything or is otherwise hard to shop for. Let us know your custom message at check out in "messages to seller." We currently do not have a wording-limit. Please keep in mind that the shorter the message, the better it will photograph. How It's Made We write your custom message in the sand on one of Cape May’s many famous beaches and capture it with our Cannon Digital Rebel XTi. The note cards are then printed out professionally onto glossy cardstock. Important: Tidings Policies -We do our best to accommodate your custom vision. -We display photographs here to give you an example of our previous work. However, because the sand color is always changing due to season, temperature and tide, we are unable to make your picture identical to the ones on display. Your sand writing photograph will always be completely unique to you. -Timing/Shipping: Since our work depends on the weather and beach traffic and our professional printing source, we ask that you allow us three weeks to create and ship your Tiding. Shipping and Presentation Each item purchased from us is presented professionally to reflect the cohesive line of products we've developed. You can have confidence in having us ship an item directly to a friend (with a complimentary note) if you'd like us to. Please include that in messages to seller.

name: Silver Tide. 8x10 Signed Fine Art Photographic Print.
description: NOTE: Your product will NOT contain a watermark. Image is displayed at a lower size/resolution. Actual print is of a much higher quality. Our "Silver Tide" photograph in size 8x10 is a stunning capture of a Stone Harbor morning. How It's Made We've captured this shot with our Digital Canon Rebel XT. No alterations have been made to this image except for minor color/exposure corrections. The 8x10 photograph is printed out on a Professional Fuji Printer on crystal archive paper (glossy). If you prefer a matte finish instead of glossy, please let us know at checkout in "messages to seller." Its Presentation Our small company sticker is displayed on the bottom-middle of the back of the print underneith the artist's signature. Each item purchased from us is presented professionally to reflect our cohesive line of products we've developed. You can have confidence in having us ship an item directly to a friend (with a complimentary note) if you'd like us to. Please include that in messages to seller.

-Timing/Shipping: Since our work depends on the weather and beach traffic, we ask that you allow us two weeks to create and ship your Tiding. If you will need it sooner, please contact us BEFORE purchasing and we will see what we can do.
